verbs.description: decapitalize (third-person singular simple present decapitalizes, present participle decapitalizing, simple past and past participle decapitalized)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To uncapitalize (convert the first letter (or more) of (something) from uppercase to lowercase)
(transitive, finance) To convert a capital value, typically into a rental
(transitive, law) To remove (something's) status as a capital crime; to cause (something) to no longer be a capital crime.
